thread.title: VA scandal "not as widespread" as Republicans claim
thread.title_full: VA scandal "not as widespread" as Republicans claim - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: VA scandal "not as widespread" as Republicans claim
text: Democratic presidential frontrunner Hillary Clinton is taking fire from veterans groups over comments she made in an interview Friday saying the scandals at the Department of Veterans Affairs were "not as widespread" as Republicans have made them out to be. Speaking on MSNCB's "Rachel Maddow Show," the former Secretary of ... ...
